CSX.O,Regulator letter to railroad CSX highlights customer complaints DETROIT, July 28 A letter from the top U.S. rail regulator to CSX Corp this week highlights growing customer dissatisfaction with the No. 3 U.S. railroad's service problems since its new chief executive officer Hunter Harrison was appointed to the spot amid investor and analyst fanfare in March. ~
DAL,Air France-KLM agrees option for Virgin Atlantic ownership in event of hard Brexit BERLIN, July 28 Air France-KLM, Delta Air Lines and Virgin Atlantic have agreed a so-called 'put' option with Virgin Group that allows Virgin Atlantic to remain in majority UK ownership in the event of a hard Brexit. ~UPDATE 1-Air France-KLM upbeat on pricing as bookings improve BERLIN, July 28 Air France-KLM offered more optimism than rivals on pricing for the rest of the year, after good travel demand resulted in better than expected second-quarter profit. ~Delta, Air France-KLM, Virgin rejig Atlantic alliances PARIS/NEW YORK Delta Air Lines , Air France-KLM  and Virgin Atlantic unveiled plans on Thursday to combine two overlapping transatlantic joint-ventures, supported by equity deals worth $1 billion, as airlines brace for more competition. ~China Eastern buys 10 pct Air France KLM stake to boost European presence SINGAPORE, July 28 China Eastern Airlines Corp Ltd said on Friday it would buy a 10 percent stake in European carrier Air France KLM SA and form a strategic partnership to improve its presence in the China-Europe market. ~
